rules_text:
{2}{G}: Glyris Greenhorn gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
Whenever Glyris Greenhorn deals combat damage to a player, promote it. [i](Put a loyalty counter on it. Then if it has three or more loyalty counters on it, transform it.)[/i]
special_text2:
[-1]: Deepwood Ranger gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
[-1]: Until end of turn, whenever Deepwood Ranger deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
